mapper.select:
SELECT course.id, course.name, course.professionId, course.startWeek, course.endWeek, pro.name as professionName FROM course_template course LEFT JOIN profession pro ON pro.id = course.professionId WHERE course.status = 1
AND professionId = #{professionId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO course_template ( name, professionId, startWeek, endWeek, createTime )VALUES
( #{course.name}, #{course.professionId}, #{course.startWeek}, #{course.endWeek}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT id, courseTemplateId, classroomId, week, startTime, endTime FROM course_instance WHERE status = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ( courseTemplateId, classroomId, week, startTime, endTime, createTime )VALUES ( #{courseTemplateId}, #{classroomId}, #{week}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, now() )

INSERT INTO student_course_relation ( courseId, studentId, createTime )VALUES
( #{course.courseId}, #{course.studentId}, now() )

INSERT INTO teacher_course_relation ( courseId, teacherId, createTime )VALUES
( #{course.courseId}, #{course.teacherId}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT instance.id, template.name as courseName, template.startWeek, template.endWeek, classroom.building, classroom.roomNumber, instance.classroomId, instance.week, instance.startTime, instance.endTime, relation.score FROM student_course_relation relation JOIN course_instance instance ON relation.courseId = instance.id JOIN course_template template ON instance.courseTemplateId = template.id JOIN classroom ON classroom.id = instance.classroomId WHERE relation.status = 1 AND relation.studentId = #{id}

SELECT instance.id, template.name as courseName, template.startWeek, template.endWeek, classroom.building, classroom.roomNumber, instance.classroomId, instance.week, instance.startTime, instance.endTime FROM course_instance instance JOIN course_template template ON instance.courseTemplateId = template.id JOIN classroom ON classroom.id = instance.classroomId WHERE instance.status = 1 and template.professionId = #{id}

SELECT instance.id, template.name as courseName, template.startWeek, template.endWeek, classroom.building, classroom.roomNumber, instance.classroomId, instance.week, instance.startTime, instance.endTime FROM teacher_course_relation relation JOIN course_instance instance ON relation.courseId = instance.id JOIN course_template template ON instance.courseTemplateId = template.id JOIN classroom ON classroom.id = instance.classroomId WHERE relation.status = 1 AND relation.teacherId = #{id}
